mapper.insert: insert into board(EVENTNM, OPAR, EVENTCO, EVENTSTARTDATE, EVENTENDDATE, EVENTSTARTTIME, EVENTENDTIME, CHRGEINFO, MNNST, AUSPCINSTT, PHONENUMBER, SUPRTINSTT, SEATNUMBER, ADMFEE, ENTNCAGE, DSCNTINFO, ATPN, HOMEPAGEURL, ADVANTKINFO, PRKPLCEYN, RDNMADR, LNMADR, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, REFERENCEDATE) values(#{eventNm}, #{opar}, #{eventCo}, #{eventStartDate}, #{eventEndDate}, #{eventStartTime}, #{eventEndTime}, #{chrgeInfo}, #{mnnst}, #{auspcInstt}, #{phoneNumber}, #{suprtInstt}, #{seatNumber}, #{admfee}, #{entncAge}, #{dscntInfo}, #{atpn}, #{homepageUrl}, #{advantkInfo}, #{prkplceYn}, #{rdnmadr}, #{lnmadr}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{referenceDate} )
mapper.select: select * from board order by eventnm
select * from board where eventco like '%뮤지컬%' order by eventnm
select * from board where eventco like '%오페라%' order by eventnm
select * from board where eventco like '%연극%' or eventco like '%공연%' or eventco like '%극%' or eventco like '%발레%' order by eventnm
select * from board where eventco like '%전시회%' or eventco like '%기념%' or eventco like '%전%' or eventco like '%화%' or eventco like '%서예%' order by eventnm

select * from board where eventco like '%음악회%' or eventco like '%음악%' or eventco like '%음%' or eventco like '%연주%' or eventco like '%악%' or eventco like '%가요%' or eventco like '%클래식%' or eventco like '%재즈%' order by eventnm
select * from board order by readcnt
select b.*, (select content from comments where comments.writer = b.writer) content from board b order by content
select b.*, (select like_type from favorite) like_type from board b order by like_type
